title: Benchmark Airyscan data matching FIB SEM data deposited on EMPIAR
description: Zeiss Airyscan laser scanning microscopy data of HeLa cells labelled with Hoechst 33342, GFP-TGN46, lysotracker red and mitotracker deep red. The light microscopy data was acquired on formaldehyde-fixed cells, which were then processed for FIB SEM. The FIB SEM data can be found on EMPIAR, entry # EMPIAR-10819.

attributes.Description: Benchmark Airyscan dataset of a Hela cell expressing GFP-TGN46 and stained with Hoechst 33342, lysotracker, and mitotracker. Used for CLEM, correlated with FIB SEM data deposited on EMPIAR (EMPIAR-10819)
Landmarks manually placed in BigWarp in both Airyscan (moving) and processed FIB SEM data (target) pre aligned to match the Airyscan orientation
Manual segmentations of 5 lysosomes in the FIB SEM data. Segmentation done on the 10nm data in TrakEM2a
attributes.Type: Label tif file exported from TrakEM2

attributes.Description: Composite of affine transform of the Airyscan data exported from BigWarp and downscaled 20nm FIB SEM data
attributes.Type: Affine transformed Airyscan and FIB SEM composite tif

attributes.Description: Composite of thin plate spline transform of the Airyscan data exported from BigWarp and downscaled 20nm FIB SEM data
attributes.Type: Thin plate spline transformed Airyscan and FIB SEM composite tif
